archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Network Planning Databases
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Various Access databases used by the Branch Network Design and Analysis team:
e.g.:
ARTHoR (used by the Network Transformation Programme) AEI txns, Branch Data, IC AgentsPay data, New Customer Sessions paystation, PILOT PostandGo, PKMAX, PAF, Retailers WTMS Travel Seasonality
These have been or will be migrated to SQL server back end, with an Access front end.
